verses.verse: In the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of the reign <S%H4467><s%> of Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Josiah, <S%H2977><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> word <S%H1697><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> saying <S%H559><s%> –
thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to me – "Make <S%H6213><s%> for yourself bonds <S%H4147><s%> and yokes <S%H4133><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> them on your neck, <S%H6677><s%>

and send <S%H7971><s%> word to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Edom, <S%H9000><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Tyre, <S%H6865><s%> and to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Sidon <S%H6721><s%> by the messengers <S%H4397><s%> who come <S%H935><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

"And command <S%H6680><s%> them [to go] to their masters, <S%H113><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> you shall say <S%H559><s%> to your masters, <S%H113><s%>

"I have made <S%H6213><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> the men <S%H120><s%> and the beasts <S%H929><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> by My great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H3581><s%> and by My outstretched <S%H5186><s%> arm, <S%H2220><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> it to the one who <S%H834><s%> is pleasing <S%H3474><s%> in My sight. <S%H5869><s%>

"And now <S%H6258><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> lands <S%H776><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> My servant, <S%H5650><s%> and I have given <S%H5414><s%> him also <S%H1571><s%> the wild <S%H9130><s%> animals <S%H9130><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> him.

"And all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> him, and his son, <S%H1121><s%> and his grandson, <S%H1121><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the time <S%H6256><s%> of his own land <S%H776><s%> comes; <S%H935><s%> then many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> will make <S%H5647><s%> him their servant. <S%H5647><s%>

"And it will be, [that] the nation <S%H1471><s%> or the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> which <S%H834><s%> will not serve <S%H5647><s%> him, Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and which <S%H834><s%> will not put <S%H5414><s%> its neck <S%H6677><s%> under the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> I will punish <S%H6485><s%> that nation <S%H1471><s%> with the sword, <S%H2719><s%> with famine, <S%H7458><s%> and with pestilence, <S%H1698><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "until <S%H5704><s%> I have destroyed <S%H8552><s%> it by his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

"But as for you, do not listen <S%H8085><s%> to your prophets, <S%H5030><s%> your diviners, <S%H7080><s%> your dreamers, <S%H2472><s%> your soothsayers, <S%H6049><s%> or your sorcerers, <S%H3786><s%> who <S%H834><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> to you, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'You shall not serve <S%H5647><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon. <S%H894><s%>'

"For they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> a lie <S%H8267><s%> to you, in order <S%H4616><s%> to remove <S%H7368><s%> you far <S%H7368><s%> from your land; <S%H127><s%> and I will drive <S%H5080><s%> you out, and you will perish.

"But the nation <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> will bring <S%H935><s%> its neck <S%H6677><s%> under the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> him, I will let remain <S%H5117><s%> on its land, <S%H127><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "and they will till <S%H5647><s%> it and dwell <S%H3427><s%> in it."' "

And I spoke <S%H1696><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> like all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> to Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Bring <S%H935><s%> your necks <S%H6677><s%> under the yoke <S%H5923><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and serve <S%H5647><s%> him and his people, <S%H5971><s%> and live! <S%H2421><s%>

"Why <S%H4100><s%> will you die, <S%H4191><s%> you and your people, <S%H5971><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> famine, <S%H7458><s%> and pestilence, <S%H1698><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has spoken <S%H1696><s%> to that nation <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> will not serve <S%H5647><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>?

"So do not listen <S%H8085><s%> to the words <S%H1697><s%> of the prophets <S%H5030><s%> who speak <S%H559><s%> to you, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'You shall not serve <S%H5647><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%>' for they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> a lie <S%H8267><s%> to you;

for I have not sent <S%H7971><s%> them," declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "but they prophesy <S%H5012><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> in My name, <S%H8034><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> that I may drive <S%H5080><s%> you out, and that you may perish, you and the prophets <S%H6><s%> who prophesy <S%H5030><s%> to you. "

[Then] I spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the priests <S%H3548><s%> and to all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord: <S%H3068><s%> Do not listen <S%H8085><s%> to the words <S%H1697><s%> of your prophets <S%H5030><s%> who prophesy <S%H5012><s%> to you, saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the Lord's house <S%H1004><s%> will now <S%H6258><s%> shortly <S%H4120><s%> be brought <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> from Babylon <S%H894><s%>'; for they are prophesying <S%H5012><s%> a lie <S%H8267><s%> to you.

"Do not listen <S%H8085><s%> to them; serve <S%H5647><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and live! <S%H2421><s%> Why <S%H4100><s%> should this <S%H384><s%> city <S%H5892><s%> become <S%H1961><s%> a ruin <S%H2723><s%>?

"But if <S%H518><s%> they are prophets, <S%H5030><s%> and if <S%H518><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is with them, let them now <S%H4994><s%> entreat <S%H6293><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> that the vessels <S%H3627><s%> which are left <S%H3498><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> may not go <S%H935><s%> to Babylon. <S%H894><s%>

"For thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> concerning <S%H413><s%> the pillars, <S%H5982><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the sea, <S%H3220><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the stands, <S%H4350><s%> and concerning <S%H5921><s%> the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the vessels <S%H3627><s%> that are left <S%H3498><s%> in this <S%H384><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%>

which <S%H834><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> did not take <S%H3947><s%> when he carried <S%H1540><s%> into exile <S%H1540><s%> Jeconiah <S%H3204><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiakim, <S%H3079><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the nobles <S%H2715><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

"Yes, <S%H3588><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> the vessels <S%H3627><s%> that are left <S%H3498><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%>

'They shall be carried <S%H935><s%> to Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and they shall be there <S%H8033><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> I visit <S%H6485><s%> them,' declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> 'Then I will bring <S%H5927><s%> them back <S%H5927><s%> and restore <S%H7725><s%> them to this <S%H2088><s%> place. <S%H4725><s%>' "
